text: The economy will collapse in the long term if we continue with the business closures and large government making decisions for us that have proven to mess everything up.

Classic counsel on cover letters! Covid-19 and business closures mean more job seekers. Get informed, boost your chances. #jobsearch #jobsearchcoach @National Harbor, Maryland https://www.instagram.com/p/B_Vosy8nb3S/?igshid=xj0jre0tc5sq
I'm guessing that would violate the mayor's non-essential business closure order?

Ok, why did this take so long...and yet mandatory stay at home orders and “non-essential business” closures have been in place for weeks... Wearing masks is key to stopping the spread but also .....responsibly reopening our Maryland economy.
Explain exactly how government-forced business closures are the “free-market”?

There is no partisanship. The governors and mayors issued all these stay-at-home orders, school closures and business restrictions so it will be up to them to lift them. Not sure what you think the president can do here? Please, explain.

That may sound like a loophole, but based on the legislative text, it seems that was intended. It’s about helping the business stay afloat to protect payroll in the long run, while ensuring businesses under forced closure don’t need to put their employees at risk
